This is safe enough (and emarrasing enough) to justify putting in maintenance stream.
Thanks Nitin, I've release fix for R1_0_maintenance, and committed fix to head stream.
*** Bug 128182 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Just want to note that this defect was only half fixed for 1.0.1.  I think the DocumentRegionProcessor was fixed but the NPE in JSLineStyleListener (reported in duplicate bug 128182) is not fixed till WTP 3.2.
I meant WTP 1.5, not WTP 3.2 (sorry, was thinking of eclipse)

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP defects already verified by the reporter but awaiting closure by the assignee.  If you feel this defect was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
